methods.name: createInterview
methods.signature: public static Flow.Interview createInterview(String namespace, String flowName, Map<String,ANY> inputVariables)
methods.description: Creates an interview for a namespaced flow.

methods.name: createInterview
methods.signature: public static Flow.Interview createInterview(String flowName, Map<String,Object> inputVariables)
methods.description: Creates an interview for a flow.

methods.name: getVariableValue
methods.description: Returns the value of the specified flow variable. The flow variable can be in the flow embedded in the Visualforce page, or in a separate flow that is called by a subflow element.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Starts an instance (interview) for an autolaunched or user provisioning flow.
